_a-0000e3e6-fb42-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_.name: AS_ADT_UT_calculateAudit_SingleObject

_a-0000e2ad-62e7-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_indexPath
_a-0000e2ad-62e7-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
with(
  local!fieldsAndIndices: rule!AS_CO_UT_zINTERNAL_indexPath_nestedFieldArrayHandler(field: ri!field),

  reduce(
    index(_, _, ri!indexDefault),
    ri!cdt,
    local!fieldsAndIndices
  )
)

_a-0000e40a-de32-8000-9ba8-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_updateCdtFieldsByFieldValuePairs

_a-0000e2cd-bc96-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_captureMetadata

_a-0000e36c-7599-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_zINTERNAL_returnCdtFields_primitiveTypeCheckHandler

_a-0000e3e6-fb42-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_.name: AS_ADT_UT_calculateAudit_MultipleObjects
AS_CO_UT_compareStrong

_a-0000e460-9d93-8000-9bc1-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_captureMetadataIfUpdated

_a-0000e415-3035-8000-9bb2-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_zINTERNAL_returnCdtFields_handler

_a-0000e3e6-fb42-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_.name: AS_ADT_UT_buildAuditLiveEntityData
_a-0000e3e6-fb42-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_entityData"(
  entity: ri!auditParams.objectDse,
  data: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
    items: ri!auditParams.newObjects,
    expression: rule!AS_CO_UT_captureMetadataIfUpdated(
      originalCdt: rule!AS_CO_UT_filterCdtByField(
        cdt: ri!auditParams.originalObjects,
        field: ri!auditParams.auditConfig.idField,
        value: fv!item[ri!auditParams.auditConfig.idField]
      ),
      updatedCdt: fv!item,
      modifiedBy: ri!auditParams.username
    )
  )
)

_a-0000e3ff-a5bc-8000-9ba8-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_displayValueMultiple

_a-0000e3e6-fb42-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_.name: AS_ADT_UT_buildSimpleFieldChangesDictionary

_a-0000e2ad-62e7-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_returnSingleTypeObject

_a-0000e3e6-fb42-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_queryEntity
AS_ADT_UT_calculateAudit
_a-0000e3e6-fb42-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
rule!AS_ADT_UT_calculateAudit_MultipleObjects(
  originalObjects: ri!originalObjects,
  newObjects: ri!newObjects,
  auditConfig: ri!auditConfig,
  username: ri!username,
  externalAction: ri!externalAction,
  auditType: ri!auditType
)

_a-0000e2ad-62e7-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_compare

_a-0000e3e6-fb42-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_displayValue
_a-0000e3e6-fb42-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
displayvalue(
  
  ri!value,
  
  ri!inArray,
  
  ri!replacement,
  
  if(
    
    ri!firstIsDefault,
    ri!replacement[1],
    
    ri!lastIsDefault,
    ri!replacement[count(ri!replacement)],
    
    ri!customDefault
  )
)

_a-0000e40a-de32-8000-9ba8-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_updateCdtFields

_a-0000e3e6-fb42-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_.name: AS_ADT_UT_determineAuditActionCode
_a-0000e3e6-fb42-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
choose(
  where(
    {
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!externalAction),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(index(ri!originalObject, ri!auditConfig.idField, null)),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(index(ri!newObject, ri!auditConfig.idField, null)),
      toboolean(index(ri!originalObject, "isActive", 1)) = toboolean(index(ri!newObject, "isActive", 1)),
      toboolean(index(ri!originalObject, "isActive", false)),
      toboolean(index(ri!newObject, "isActive", true))
    }
  )[1],
  ri!externalAction,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_ADD,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_DELETE,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_MODIFY,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_DEACTIVATE,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_REACTIVATE
)

_a-0000e2ad-62e7-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_filterCdtByField
AS_CO_UT_not
AS_CO_UT_returnCdtFields

0002e3f1-20c0-8000-f9f8-7f0000014e7a-adt.name: AS ADT Audit Process

AS_ADT_UT_buildSimpleFieldChanges

_a-0000e3e6-fb42-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_.name: AS_ADT_UT_buildAuditEntityData
_a-0000e3e6-fb42-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_entityData"(
  entity: ri!auditParams.auditDse,
  data: rule!AS_ADT_UT_calculateAudit(
    originalObjects: ri!auditParams.originalObjects,
    newObjects: ri!auditParams.newObjects,
    objectTypeNumber: ri!auditParams.objectTypeNumber,
    namespace: ri!auditParams.namespace,
    username: ri!auditParams.username,
    auditConfig: ri!auditParams.auditConfig,
    externalAction:ri!auditParams.externalAction,
    auditType: ri!auditParams.auditType
  )
)

_a-0000e447-933d-8000-9baa-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_toString
